Food.name: Sushi at Tsukiji Market
Food.description: Experience the freshest sushi in Tokyo, prepared by masters at the historic Tsukiji fish market.
Food.recommend: Try omakase-style sushi with seasonal fish.

Food.name: Ramen Street at Tokyo Station
Food.description: A paradise for ramen lovers offering different regional broths and noodle styles.
Food.recommend: Shoyu ramen from Tokyo-style shops is a must.

Culture.name: Meiji Shrine
Culture.description: A peaceful Shinto shrine surrounded by forest, offering a quiet escape from the busy city.
Culture.recommend: Visit early morning for the best experience.

Technology.name: Akihabara
Technology.description: Tokyo’s electric town full of tech shops, gaming arcades, and anime culture.
Technology.recommend: Explore the latest gadgets and themed cafés.
